test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the main workspace.

test_scenarios.name: Collection Creation
test_scenarios.expected_result: A new collection is created and displayed in the sidebar.

test_scenarios.name: Successful GET Request
test_scenarios.expected_result: The request is executed, and a 200 OK response is received with valid JSON data.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Logout
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is successfully logged out and redirected to the login page.
